3a96c973-68ac-41e8-9cae-5731c8130100.title: PixelFS compression module
3a96c973-68ac-41e8-9cae-5731c8130100.description:
Add compression support to PixelFS:
                - Implement RLE compression for pixel data
                - Add LZ4 compression option
                - Update header format
                - Benchmark compression ratios
                400+ lines with tests

41b2f7e6-f7b3-44df-a2e7-f8eb994917e2.title: Infinite Map tile cache optimization
41b2f7e6-f7b3-44df-a2e7-f8eb994917e2.description:
Optimize tile caching in InfiniteMap:
                - Implement LRU eviction with statistics
                - Add prefetching for spatial access patterns
                - Async tile loading
                - Memory pressure handling
                500+ lines
